

```{r,echo=FALSE}

```



```{r,include=FALSE}

a<-get_wh(p,unit = "cm")

png(paste(graphs_path,"/logistic/Logistic_forestplotbaseCHD_cont",".png",sep=""), res = 200, width = a[1], height = a[2], units = "cm")
print(p)
dev.off()
```
